description: The Colorado Grain Chain is an initiative aimed at establishing a sustainable grain economy in Colorado. It connects small grain growers, millers, bakers, and distillers to promote heritage and heirloom grains. The organization facilitates market access, provides resources for grain processing, and hosts community events to raise awareness about the nutritional and environmental benefits of diverse grain production. Through collaboration, it seeks to revitalize local agriculture and strengthen community ties.
name: Colorado Grain Chain
